summary: Soe Hok Gie is an activist who lived in the sixties. Set in the darkest era of Indonesian modern history, "Gie" is an interpretation of what happened based on his journal.
cast: Nicholas Saputra|Jonathan Mulia|Thomas Nawilis|Christian Audi|Sita Nursanti|Wulan Guritno|Lukman Sardi|Indra Birowo|Surya Saputra|Donny Alamsyah|Robby Tumewu|Tutie Kirana|Gino Korompis|Marcell Audi Buwono|Lidia Andriani|Juli Permatasari|Clarine Baharrizki|Rosseline Oscar|Soultan Saladin|Ella Gayo|Agastya Kandou|Wyan Sonatha|Ayez Kassar|Sonny Soeng|Tio Djarot|Henidar Amroe|Happy Salma|Sigit Hardadi|Seno Budiono|Miryawati Djumhana|Putu Indah Parwati|Norman R. Akyuwen|Eddy Rahardjo|Liem Gak Tjay|Nyo Hadimulyo|Mulyohadi Purnomo|Julian|Oim Said|Kanatski|George Arif|Puspa Allamanda
keywords: character name as title|one word title|friend|idealism|communist
title: Gie
